Package pl.lib.model

Class ReportStyles

java.lang.Object
pl.lib.model.ReportStyles
public final class ReportStyles extends Object
Utility class containing predefined style names, colors, fonts and patterns for reports.

This class provides constants for standard report styling including style names, color definitions, font families, and formatting patterns. All constants are used throughout the library to ensure consistent appearance.

Style names:

  • HEADER_STYLE - Style for column headers
  • DATA_STYLE - Style for data cells
  • NUMERIC_STYLE - Style for numeric data cells
  • GROUP_STYLE_1 - Primary group header style
  • GROUP_STYLE_2 - Secondary group header style

Color constants:

  • Text colors: COLOR_WHITE, COLOR_BLACK
  • Background colors: COLOR_PRIMARY_BACKGROUND, COLOR_SECONDARY_BACKGROUND
  • Table colors: COLOR_TABLE_HEADER_BACKGROUND, COLOR_TABLE_BORDER
  • Group colors: COLOR_GROUP_BACKGROUND

Usage example:


 Style headerStyle = new Style(ReportStyles.HEADER_STYLE)
     .withFont(ReportStyles.FONT_DEJAVU_SANS, 10, true)
     .withColors(ReportStyles.COLOR_BLACK, ReportStyles.COLOR_TABLE_HEADER_BACKGROUND);
Since:
1.0
